00005         uint8 type = ideDetectDeviceType(dev);
00006 
00007         if (type == T_UNKNOWN)
00008         {
00009                 return 0;
00010         } else
00011         {
00012                 return 1;

00016 //Returns 1 if success 0 if fail
00017 uint8 diskRead(uint16* dest, uint32 offset_sectors, uint32 num_sectors, disk_device device)
00018 {
00019         if (num_sectors == 0) return;
00020 
00021         for (;;)
00022         {
00023                 if (num_sectors  == 256)
00024                 {
00025                   if (pio_28bit_read(device, dest, offset_sectors, 0) == 0) return 0; //Error fail to read
00026                   break;
00027                 } else if (num_sectors > 256)
00028                 {
00029                   num_sectors = num_sectors - 256;
00030                   if (pio_28bit_read(device, dest, offset_sectors, 0) == 0) return 0; //Error, fail to read
00031                   offset_sectors = offset_sectors + 256; //Increment the offset by 256
00032                   dest = ((uint16*)dest) + (sizeof(uint16) * 256); //Increment the destination pointer by that
00033                 } else if (num_sectors < 1)
00034                 {
00035                   break;
00036                 } else {
00037                   uint8 ntr = num_sectors; //Will fit in a uint8
00038                   if (pio_28bit_read(device, dest, offset_sectors, ntr) == 0) return 0; //Error, fail to read
00039                   break;
00040                 }
00041         }
00042 
00043         return 1;
00044 }
